subject: Baseball
Wrists
Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Having recovered from wrist surgery in 2013, Teixeira is on pace this season finish with 40 home runs and 118 runs batted in for the Yankees.
snippet: Having recovered from wrist surgery in 2013, Teixeira is on pace this season finish with 40 home runs and 118 runs batted in for the Yankees.
